In Bomi County Liberia , LLINs distribute malaria prevalence child 5 remains high , prevalence study village find 42 % April 2014 . The major malaria vector specie resistant pyrethroid insecticide approve use LLINs , new control measure non-pyrethroid active ingredient may protect population .
